attributes.action: Ban homework except revision and GCSE coursework.
attributes.additional_details: It mainly helps improve students mental health and allows them to spend more time with family, doing exercise and learning new skills.
attributes.background: The idea is to release stress of students and feel more confident of going to school without the worry of getting there homework done, however I believe allowing students to revise for a test and GCSE is still quite important.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Abolish all homework:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643846

Ban homework except for GCSE coursework:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/637387

Ban primary schools from setting homework:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/636943
